Event_Description: EU imposes oil embargo on Iran (nuclear program sanctions tighten)
OPEC decides against production cuts (flood market vs US shale)
China stock market crash and devaluation (demand fears)
JCPOA implementation lifting major Iran sanctions
OPEC agrees production cut (first in years with non-OPEC)
US withdraws from Iran deal and reimposes maximum pressure sanctions
Drone attacks on Saudi Aramco facilities (Abqaiq/Khurais)
WHO declares COVID-19 pandemic; demand collapse begins
Likely_Brent_Impact: Sharp demand shock and price collapse

Event_Description: WTI futures briefly turn negative amid storage constraints
Likely_Brent_Impact: Severe downward pressure across crude markets

Event_Description: OPEC+ agrees to gradually raise output through summer
Russia invades Ukraine; sanctions disrupt energy flows
US announces largest-ever strategic petroleum reserve release
